requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A customer service agent named Sam who needs real-time access to call logs.
user_goal: Sam wants to load the latest open calls without refreshing the entire page.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Open Calls
narrative_steps.description: Sam logs into the system and clicks on the 'Open Calls' link in the navigation bar to see unresolved issues.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Open Calls' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The content area updates dynamically to show a list of open calls fetched from the backend API without reloading the page.

requirement_tested: A backend API server connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer named Taylor responsible for deploying the backend service.
user_goal: Ensure the backend connects properly to the PostgreSQL database with correct environment configuration.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Taylor sets up the environment variables as instructed and starts the backend server.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server after setting DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes successfully and establishes connection to the PostgreSQL database without errors.

requirement_tested: Client identification functionality with search and selection capabilities
user_persona: A support agent named Riley handling incoming calls.
user_goal: Riley wants to quickly locate a client by name to associate with a new call log.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Client
narrative_steps.description: Riley begins typing the client's name into the 'Find Client' search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'John Doe' into the client search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of matching clients appears below the search bar, fetched dynamically from the backend API.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting the Correct Client
narrative_steps.description: Riley sees the correct client in the list and clicks on it to select.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the matching client entry from the search results.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected client is highlighted, and relevant fields such as name and contact info populate automatically in the form.

requirement_tested: Call type selection dropdown or radio button component
user_persona: A new agent named Alex learning how to log customer interactions.
user_goal: Alex needs to categorize the reason for the customer's call accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Call Type Dropdown
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks the 'Call Type' dropdown menu to choose the category of the interaction.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Call Type' dropdown menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown expands to reveal options like 'Technical Support', 'Billing Inquiry', etc.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Appropriate Category
narrative_steps.description: Alex selects 'Technical Support' because the customer had trouble using the product.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Technical Support' option in the dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown closes and 'Technical Support' is now displayed as the selected value.

requirement_tested: Information recording form for capturing call details
user_persona: An experienced agent named Jordan processing a high volume of calls daily.
user_goal: Jordan aims to record essential information about the customer's issue efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out Call Details
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills out the 'Description', 'Caller Name', and 'Phone Number' fields with information gathered during the call.
narrative_steps.action: Enter text into the 'Description', 'Caller Name', and 'Phone Number' fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All entered data is captured visibly in the form fields ready for submission.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Form
narrative_steps.description: After filling out the necessary fields, Jordan clicks the submit button to save the log.
narrative_steps.action: Click the submit button at the bottom of the form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form data is sent to the backend API, and a success confirmation appears briefly.

requirement_tested: Action step recording section for documenting actions taken during calls
user_persona: A team lead named Casey reviewing agent performance and ensuring quality documentation.
user_goal: Casey wants to verify that agents document every action taken during a call.

narrative_steps.title: Adding an Action Step
narrative_steps.description: While reviewing a call log, Casey notices an undocumented action and adds it manually.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'Reset user password' into the 'Actions Taken' textarea and click 'Add Action'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The action is submitted to the backend and immediately appears in the list of documented actions for that call.

requirement_tested: Follow-up step recording functionality for scheduling future actions
user_persona: A proactive agent named Morgan tracking required follow-ups after resolving complex issues.
user_goal: Morgan schedules a reminder to check if the customer’s problem was fully resolved.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Up Follow-Up Date
narrative_steps.description: Morgan picks a date one week ahead in the date picker and enters a note explaining the purpose.
narrative_steps.action: Choose a date from the date picker and enter 'Confirm resolution with client' into the notes field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both the date and note are filled in the respective input fields.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Follow-Up Reminder
narrative_steps.description: Morgan saves the follow-up by clicking the designated button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Add Follow-Up' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The follow-up task is saved and displayed in the follow-up list with the chosen date and note.

requirement_tested: Additional information recording field for miscellaneous call notes
user_persona: A detail-oriented agent named Quinn noting down unique observations during a call.
user_goal: Quinn records contextual information that doesn’t fit into other sections.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Additional Context
narrative_steps.description: Quinn jots down some personal observations in the 'Additional Notes' section.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Customer sounded frustrated but appreciative of quick help' into the Additional Notes textarea.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The text is stored temporarily in the textarea until explicitly saved.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Extra Notes
narrative_steps.description: Quinn decides to preserve these insights permanently by saving them.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Notes' button next to the Additional Notes section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The notes are posted to the backend and remain visible even after page refresh.

requirement_tested: New call log creation form with all required data fields
user_persona: A trainee agent named Drew getting familiar with logging procedures.
user_goal: Drew completes and submits a new call log with all mandatory information.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Required Fields
narrative_steps.description: Drew ensures all required fields—client, call type, and description—are filled before submitting.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in client selection, call type dropdown, and description fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each required field shows valid input, and the 'Create Log' button becomes active.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Call Log
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the entries, Drew submits the new call log.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Create Log' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system validates inputs, creates the log via the API, and redirects to the log details page.

requirement_tested: Open calls view displaying unresolved customer service calls
user_persona: A supervisor named Blair monitoring ongoing unresolved tickets.
user_goal: Blair reviews the list of open calls to assign priorities.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Open Calls
narrative_steps.description: Blair navigates to the 'Open Calls' view to get an overview of pending issues.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Open Calls' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A scrollable list of open calls loads dynamically, each showing caller name, call type, and creation time.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Specific Call
narrative_steps.description: Blair clicks on one of the more urgent-looking entries to investigate further.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific open call item in the list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system navigates to the detailed view of the selected call log.

requirement_tested: To-do calls view showing pending follow-up actions
user_persona: An efficient agent named Avery managing scheduled tasks throughout the day.
user_goal: Avery checks the 'Pending Tasks' list to stay on top of upcoming responsibilities.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Pending Tasks
narrative_steps.description: Avery switches to the 'Pending Tasks' tab to review scheduled follow-ups.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Pending Tasks' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A chronological list of upcoming tasks appears, each labeled with a due date and brief description.

narrative_steps.title: Following Up on Scheduled Task
narrative_steps.description: Noticing a task due today, Avery clicks it to handle the follow-up promptly.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a task item from the list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system redirects to the related call log page where the original follow-up was set.

requirement_tested: Call log reporting feature with export capabilities
user_persona: A manager named Lee preparing monthly summaries for upper management.
user_goal: Lee generates and exports a report summarizing recent activity.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Report Data
narrative_steps.description: Lee selects the desired filters and prepares the report.
narrative_steps.action: Apply date range and user filters, then click 'Generate Report'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system compiles the filtered data and presents it in a preview table.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting as CSV
narrative_steps.description: Lee prefers to analyze the numbers offline and chooses to export the report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export as CSV' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A downloadable CSV file containing the report data is generated and downloaded automatically.

requirement_tested: Client creator wizard for adding new customer information
user_persona: A receptionist named Zoe registering a first-time caller into the system.
user_goal: Zoe captures complete client information through a guided process.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Client Creation Wizard
narrative_steps.description: Zoe initiates the client registration flow by opening the wizard.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Add New Client' button which launches the wizard modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The first step of the wizard ('Basic Info') is displayed with empty input fields.

narrative_steps.title: Progressing Through Steps
narrative_steps.description: Zoe fills in basic info and moves to the next stages until completion.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out Basic Info → Click 'Next' → Fill Contact Details → Click 'Next' → Review Preferences → Click 'Finish'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each step transitions smoothly, validating input, and upon finishing, the new client is added to the database.

requirement_tested: Client information modification interface for updating existing client data
user_persona: A long-term agent named Kai updating outdated client contact information.
user_goal: Kai edits a client’s phone number and email after receiving corrected details.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Edit Mode
narrative_steps.description: Kai finds the client profile and clicks the edit button to make changes.
narrative_steps.action: Locate client and click the 'Edit' button beside their profile.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The client information form becomes editable with current values pre-filled.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Contact Information
narrative_steps.description: Kai modifies the phone number and email fields based on the latest conversation.
narrative_steps.action: Change the values in the 'Phone' and 'Email' fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Updated values are reflected in the form fields.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Updated Information
narrative_steps.description: Once satisfied with the corrections, Kai saves the updated information.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Changes' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are sent to the backend and persisted, with a success notification confirming the update.

requirement_tested: Permission control system for managing user access levels
user_persona: A security-conscious admin named Morgan overseeing user permissions.
user_goal: Morgan verifies that restricted features are inaccessible to unauthorized users.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Restricted Access
narrative_steps.description: Morgan logs in as a viewer-level user and attempts to delete a call log.
narrative_steps.action: Log in as a 'Viewer' user and try navigating to the delete function on a call log detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Delete option is either hidden or disabled, preventing unauthorized deletion attempts.
